text: "Do You Want to Know a Secret" is a 1963 song by The Beatles and taken from their debut studio album Please Please Me. It went to number 2 in New Zealand and the United States and number 34 in Germany. It was covered in the United Kingdom by Billy J. Kramer with the Dakotas. == References == Category:1963 songs Category:1960s ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:The Beatles songs
title: Do You Want to Know a Secret
